item.title: 24H INFO
item.description: The 2023 edition of the 24 hours of info took place in Bourg-en-Bresse, and was organized by the IUT Lyon 1 ! We were 23 teams in competition. Membres de l’Ã©quipe : BOBEUF Jules LinkedIn FIEVET Arnaud LinkedIn I/ How did I discover this competition? During my computer science degree at the IUT of Lens, our web development teacher told us about this competition. This year, I also had the opportunity to participate to the SWERC, a really memorable experience!

item.title: SWERC
item.description: The 2023 edition of SWERC took place in Milan, Italy! We were 120 teams in competition. Project members : FALQUE Thibault (coach) LinkedIn BOBEUF Jules LinkedIn FACON Nicolas LinkedIn I/ How did I discover this competition? During my computer science degree at the IUT of Lens, there were occasional SAE (Situation of Apprentice and Evaluation). In semester 3, our teacher decided to realize a small algorithmic competition between the different students of the promotion.
